code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var userSlice=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:{user:null},reducers:{loginz:function loginz(state,action){state.user=action.payload;},logoutz:function logoutz(state){state.user=null;},editz:function editz(state,action){state.user=action.payload;}}});var _userSlice$actions=userSlice.actions,loginz=_userSlice$actions.loginz,logoutz=_userSlice$actions.logoutz,editz=_userSlice$actions.editz;export{loginz,logoutz,editz};export var selectUser=function selectUser(state){return state.user.user;};export default userSlice.reducer;
